title: Rawlicious - Bloor West
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, All Raw
description: Raw food restaurant featuring an organic and vegan menu consisting of fully raw appetizers, soups, salads, main entrees, smoothies, fresh juices, and desserts. No wheat, dairy, or refined sugar. Casual nice modern interior with artwork display. Local musicians delight diners on some Friday and/or Saturday nights playing on a baby grand piano. Inside is also a small retail section that features some raw essentials. Located near High Park subway station exit Clendenan. Open hours change often, so call ahead.
